title: Bank will not pass a donation to Thunderbird because the payment is to an overseas location.  Bank wants to know which country
content: Why is a donation to Thunderbird being paid to an overseas location? Which country?

title: Thunderbird suddenly not responding.
content: Yesterday Thunderbird suddenly stopped receiving and sending emails on my Notebook. Email still works on my Phone (Samsung Galaxy Email) and settings are the same for both devices. Any suggestions on getting the Notebook version working again?
creator: agray62

title: THUNDERBIRD PASSWORD ANNOYANCE ....
content:
Good afternoon,

Each time I load Thunderbird, I am prompted to enter the password for two email accounts, namely: 'president@crcc.com.au', 'secretary@crcc.com.au'. How do I fix this, please?

Lance Haslewood Australia lanceh49@bigpond.com lanceh22749@gmail,com

title: Thunderbird 128 Needed css instructions to make Today pane events to follow calendar tags color
content: I would very much appreciate any help so that background color of events in Today's pane follow the defined tags color and not follow the calendar's color.

title: allegato sospetto
content: salve continuo a ricevere da giorni lo stesso allegato. una foto . la foto e' una foto di famiglia, che pero' non mi e' stata inviata da nessuno. laricevo da tutte le email che mi inviano. esempio : email da enel energia, ricevo la foto invece della classica bolletta. allego uno screen .
creator: pucci.paola

title: non ricevo più e-mail da tre dei miei 4 account
content: Sto tenendo 4 account su thunderbird e solo da uno ricevo email. Gli altri sembrano avere qualche blocco. Ogni volta che accedo a Thunderbird compare la notifica : non è possibile connettersi al server g''.it la connessione è stata rifiutata. Vi chiedo se riuscite ad aiutarmi a risolvere questi problemi
creator: m.rosco

title: Advanced message filtering
content:
Hi I need to create a filtering rule so that messages with attachments (specifically PDF files) are moved to another folder. I can't find a parameter anywhere that would allow me to create such a filter. Please help. Is this even possible?

Best regards Slawek
creator: slawolsz10
